member.name: F:WixToolset.Mba.Core.BOOTSTRAPPER_EXECUTEPROCESSCANCEL_ACTION.Abandon
member.summary: Instructs the engine to stop waiting for the process to exit. The package is immediately considered to have failed with ERROR_INSTALL_USEREXIT. The engine will never rollback the package.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Mba.Core.BOOTSTRAPPER_EXECUTEPROCESSCANCEL_ACTION.Wait
member.summary: Instructs the engine to wait for the process to exit. Once the process has exited, the package is considered to have failed with ERROR_INSTALL_USEREXIT. This allows the engine to rollback the package if necessary.

member.name: T:WixToolset.Mba.Core.PackageState
member.summary: Describes the state of an installation package.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Mba.Core.PackageState.Unknown
member.summary: Invalid state.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Mba.Core.PackageState.Obsolete
member.summary: The package is not on the machine (except possibly MspPackage) and should not be installed.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Mba.Core.PackageState.Absent
member.summary: The package is not installed.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Mba.Core.PackageState.Present
member.summary: The package is installed.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Mba.Core.PackageState.Superseded
member.summary: The package is on the machine but not active, so only uninstall operations are allowed.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Mba.Core.PackageState.Cached
member.summary: This value is no longer used. See the DetectPackageCompleteEventArgs.Cached value instead.

member.summary: Indicates the state desired for an installation package.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Mba.Core.RequestState.None
member.summary: No change requested.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Mba.Core.RequestState.ForceAbsent
member.summary: As long as there are no dependents, the package will be uninstalled. There are some packages that can't be uninstalled, such as an ExePackage without an UninstallCommand.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Mba.Core.RequestState.Absent
member.summary: Request the package to not be installed on the machine.

member.summary: Request the package to be cached and not be installed on the machine.

member.summary: Request the package to be installed on the machine.
